body.name: DA_ORG_ADS_BILLING_STN_XREF
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ORG_ADS_BILLING_STN_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.05.316480000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_org_ads_billing_stn_xref.add(fx), parms=' || party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_org_ads_billing_stn_xref a
(
a.billing_station_id
,a.party_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_billing_station_id.NEXTVAL
,add.party_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.billing_station_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_org_ads_billing_stn_xref.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_org_ads_billing_stn_xref.add, parms=' || party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_org_ads_billing_stn_xref a
(
a.billing_station_id
,a.party_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_billing_station_id.NEXTVAL
,add.party_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_org_ads_billing_stn_xref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_org_ads_billing_stn_xref.add, parms=' || billing_station_id || '|' || party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_org_ads_billing_stn_xref a
(
a.billing_station_id
,a.party_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.billing_station_id
,add.party_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_org_ads_billing_stn_xref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_org_ads_billing_stn_xref.del, parms=' || billing_station_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_org_ads_billing_stn_xref a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.billing_station_id = del.billing_station_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_org_ads_billing_stn_xref.del');

END del;

END da_org_ads_billing_stn_xref;
